cause.description:
Your donations will help Freedom from Hunger provide sustainable and innovative self-help solutions to women around the world. By combining education and health initiatives with microfinance, Freedom from Hunger substantially improves living conditions for the world's poor.
Because there is a 4.5% transaction fee charged by donating through this link, we encourage you to donate directly through Freedom from Hunger's website ( http://www.freedomfromhunger.org ) to ensure that your donation goes straight to fighting global hunger.
1. Health, self-reliance, and dignity are essential to help end global hunger and poverty.
cause.name: Freedom from Hunger
